website_summaries.verdict: These flashing LED balloons are the light of the party.
pros: Multi-color LED lights are bright and vibrant in dim lighting
Lights continue flashing for roughly 24 hours
Balloons are easy to fill with air or helium
cons: Because of the extra weight, the balloons start to deflate faster than most – about 6 hours

customer_reviews.title: These are really pretty and fun
customer_reviews.text: These are really pretty and fun. Be sure to take them in a dark room b/c the balloons completely change color again & again which can't be seen in even dim light. Fun for parties and fun to continue the party at night as night lights (- :
customer_reviews.author: Wendy B

customer_reviews.title: Even brighter than the picture!
customer_reviews.text: I almost didn't purchase because I thought the color was too pale. Very vibrant! Blew up half with helium, the other half just air.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Loved these, ordered them for NYE party- however
customer_reviews.text: Loved these, ordered them for NYE party- however, maybe 3 hours after inflating the them with co2 they started to shrink! I knew they’d eventually start deflating but not so soon...
customer_reviews.author: manuel

customer_reviews.title: Loves these
customer_reviews.text: These things were amazing. They were still lighting 3 days after. Just dont over fill them with air.
customer_reviews.author: Kyhamil

customer_reviews.title: Great value and fun
customer_reviews.text: Can't believe I didn't discover these sooner. Kids love these things... only problem is they flash for hours, and hours, and hours and Jr wanted to take it to bed. Next day wasn't still really visible but the LED was still flashing. For the price these are awesome, just pull the paper stem out, blow up, and gtg. Only tested 2 so far and both worked fine, still have 48 more left for the birthday party! Keep in mind these do flash quiclly so if you light off all 50 in a room you might get a headache, lol.
customer_reviews.author: DLee

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly Bright!
customer_reviews.text: These work very well! Blinking lights. Very bright all night long. It has been 1 WEEK since I lit the balloon and there is still a very faint flicker. The balloons have a paper pull tab to activate the battery, then blow up the balloon and tie it up. I have not tried adding helium, but the balloons that I used stayed inflated for over a week so far. Great Deal on a light up balloon. The blinking light is built into the balloon, so no way to turn off or remove after activating without popping the balloon.
customer_reviews.author: PanamaEric

customer_reviews.title: The lights will last...
customer_reviews.text: We bought these balloons for my daughter's birthday party. She wanted a blow in the dark party. We had plenty of other lighting and these balloons were good fillers. The balloons will not stay in the air for more than a good 4-6 hours due to the added weight of the light. The lights themselves worked great. Once the balloons lost air you could no longer see the lights inside the balloons, but my son cut Then out and decorated his room with the lights for Christmas. Two weeks after the party the lights were still flashing. They are flashing lights and will not be a constantly lit balloon, but they are a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Justin L

customer_reviews.title: So Awesome but only for 2 hours
customer_reviews.text: We ordered these for my daughters 10th birthday- theme was neon lights. These balloons take some work to insert the lights, blow up, tie and to add a ribbon/string. Once I completed about 90 minutes of work to get them assembled and blown up, they looked freaking amazing... BUT not for long. By the time the party started most of the lights went out and they lost their luster. If you buy these- make sure you blow them up RIGHT BEFORE the party- so they don't go dim before hand. I blew these up between 3-430pm and the party started at 7- they were all fading and lackluster by then. Kids still enjoyed them though.
customer_reviews.author: Awishing

customer_reviews.title: These are super fun
customer_reviews.text: This ballons were a steal super cheap for the amount of fun u get not to mention they add glamour to any party, easy to blow like a regular balloon they light for hours even when they busted the little lights came out and had the whole pool glowing!! Two days later my kids still have the lights! (watch small babies around any small objects) overall these ballons are lit... literally two thimbs up
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: Great for marketing
customer_reviews.text: As a realtor, I am always looking for ways to up the marketing on my listings. These balloons are fantastic. I put them on the Open House sign at dusk the night before. The lights keep blinking for 48+ hours. I usually blow them up myself, but they work great with helium also. I have also used them inside the house to target key areas and amenities that are special or upgrades. Keeps the buyers focused on the house and not the stuff. These would be great for children's parties, or for marking a hidden driveway for guests. Love the different colors.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Christian

customer_reviews.title: Use to be a great product, now subpar
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased these balloons a total of 3 times. The most recent purchase was a lot lesser quality than the previous 2 times. Before, the balloon lights would last for days. My most recent purchase had lights that only lasted a few hours (and weren’t nearly as vivid). Also, these balloons popped incredibly easily unlike before.
customer_reviews.author: Danna

customer_reviews.title: Flawed design makes for a sad bouquet of balloons
customer_reviews.text: The concept with this product is really cool, but the design is way flawed. There is a tiny LED light in each ballon, and the problem is that it weighs more than the ballon. So if the light does not stay in place, it can flip the balloons on their heads and weigh them down. The result for me was a cluster of saggy, sideways or upside down balloons, which was more sad than festive to look at. Would not buy again, or recommend to anyone unless these are redesigned.
customer_reviews.author: CS

customer_reviews.title: Only got 15 to inflate without popping
customer_reviews.text: We gave up after 30 balloons. The idea is cool but the ones that did inflate, the light was disappointing at best. Combine the lackluster light with the failure rate/popping I'd encourage you to stay away from these.
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and great fun
customer_reviews.text: Fun for all my grandkids! I have been looking for more and more ways to keep my grandkids entertained since most of the places we visit when I watch them are still closed due to covid. This was a fun surprise for them the last time they spent the night! The balloons have a pull tab to turn the lights on, they blow up easy, and are thick enough to play with in the grass outside in the dark! We only came across 1 balloon that the light wouldn't turn on and we have used a over a dozen already. Great fun that keeps them away from screens!
customer_reviews.author: Morning Glory

customer_reviews.title: A fun addition to any party
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a blacklight party that my son went to. Since they light up on the inside, they were the perfect accessory to go with the other party decorations. They were very easy to inflate. In fact, the kids blew them up themselves. The lights lasted longer than expected as well.
customer_reviews.author: Darling Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Used these balloons to decorate our home for my daughters 11th birthday and they are amazing! Quality is great! I did pop a few while blowing them up but it’s ok I just took the led lights of the ones I popped blowing it up and put the LED lights in other ones for extra blink. The LED lights will not be as bright two days later. I set up at 3am on May 7th and it is now May 22 and the balloons are still inflated and I can see some of the LEDs still blinking but not bright enough to light up like in the video. Either way, the quality of these balloons are awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Ike

customer_reviews.title: Great for her dance party birthday.
customer_reviews.text: We used these for my daughters birthday party which was a dance theme. All the kids loved that they lit up so they were great. I would say if you want them to float you have to get a helium tank of course so just remember that but there was plenty of balloons, I didn’t use them all and it was easy to do, right before her party I pulled out the tag it has so the light turns on and then blew them up with the tank.
customer_reviews.author: Arlene

customer_reviews.title: Let’s have a get together
customer_reviews.text: Large quantity , plenty to fill a whole party room. Easy to use with just blowing to inflate. The lighting inside is nice and bright giving off a nice glow in the room. Adds character to the occasion. Very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Audre H

customer_reviews.title: Lasts a few hours at most. 5 hrs later they weren’t lit
customer_reviews.text: I would give zero but the balloons are super cool at first. I blew these up around midnight so my daughter would see them them when she woke up on her birthday. She woke up at 5am and they had all stopped blinking and were no longer lit up.
customer_reviews.author: DTad

customer_reviews.title: Worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: I first found light up balloons at hobby lobby, averaging $1 per balloon. Those balloons are more dense, so you get to toss around a glowing orb. These you can see the light in the balloon when in the dark more than you see a glowing balloon but my kid loves it the same and for this price, he can play with a new one anytime.
customer_reviews.author: Juliet B. Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Love these reasonably priced balloons
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these. Wanted to hand out led balloons for Halloween with candy. Thought I’d try these and just use Halloween colors. Turns out all the colors will work because in the dark the led light changes colors and they look awesome. A light blue balloon, for instance, will change green in the dark and then change again, which is perfect. We blew the ones we tested pretty full and had no issues with popping. Can’t wait to use them on Halloween.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super bright !!
customer_reviews.text: I never leave reviews but these balloons were more than perfect . We lost our 9 year young son on November 29,2019 and his first heavenly bday was August 18,2020. I purchased these balloons to send him messages all the way to the sky. They flew away without any issues and I couldn’t have been happier.
customer_reviews.author: daisy Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Work as intended, but not my first choice.
customer_reviews.text: The kiddo loves them, but they are not the best flashing balloons that we have had. The balloons are multicolored, but so is the light. Due to this, you really can't tell what color the balloons are when you turn the lights off. It also flashes way too fast and makes me a little dizzy. So far, they all have lit up fine. They work for the few hours we use them and continue to flash red for days after (kinda weird).
customer_reviews.author: Jeenyus

customer_reviews.title: So Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, easy to use. We used these for our daughter's birthday party, and everyone asked where we got them. We had no issues activating the LED in each balloon. They have a little ball inside that lights up when you pull a tab out prior to inflating. There were no problems filling them with helium, either. They are very durable and vibrant colors. Excellent price for what you receive.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Okay but not very durable.
customer_reviews.text: Most of these seem to work like they are supposed to, as far as the lights go. Some of the lights did not work right out of the package. They also feel very thin compared to other balloons. They are super easy to pop, but the little people had a great time with them.
customer_reviews.author: The guy who bought this

customer_reviews.title: Buy these
customer_reviews.text: I will definitely be buying more of these. So bright, beautiful and last forever. Worth every penny. Everyone loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: These balloons are so cool! They light up for a very long time! I’m talking days. They come in different colors so you can mix and match depending on the occasion or use them all. Kids love them.
customer_reviews.author: MiamiLadyLiving

customer_reviews.title: Very Good party stuff and Kids like it very much!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these balloons for my daughter birthday party! We invited few kids coming to join the party, most same age which is 5 years old. It is so cool! The kids absolutely loved it and played with the led balloons for awhile!! And very safe for the kids. Light weight, use little battery. Highly recommend! Kids love it so so much!!
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: Really loud
customer_reviews.text: The balloons were fun for a few minutes then they would pop just sitting still. That was not how I intended to wake my daughter on her birthday, but it was definitely a surprise. To all of us.
customer_reviews.author: TBRfc06

customer_reviews.title: Overall not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Although a few of the balloon were nice in the dark, the majority of them either did not light up or the LED was too dim to really tell. Because of the weight of LED, the helium hardly held them up for long before they looked like wilted flowers. Also, at least three of the balloon had holes in them and could not be blown up. Overall I would not buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah B

customer_reviews.title: Balloons stayed lit for 3 days!! Very happy.
customer_reviews.text: These were so great. Blew up nicely, not too big but not too small. The balloons stayed lit for over 3 days!! Really happy with brightness of colors.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Morales

customer_reviews.title: very very cool!
customer_reviews.text: I used these to light up my tent at a festival and they were a total hit. What you don't see in the pictures are the different colors the led lights flash making them trippy. I will totally be buying these again, very very cool!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren M.

customer_reviews.title: Great for party
customer_reviews.text: We very love these flashing LED balloons! They are very easy to to select a setting, and easy to turn off. Lights up with the touch of a button it blinks or stays on and can also be turned off. They are pretty, fun, and will be the hit of any party! They lasted the entire 4 hours and were still going! Will definitely buy again for the next party!
customer_reviews.author: Landrum

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Substantial. Our lit ones lasted 4 days! Usually, just overnight, so I am impressed. Surprising play value.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome light up balloons
customer_reviews.text: Fun fun fun grandkids cannot get enough of these turn all the lights off let them play in the house rainy days will not be boring
customer_reviews.author: wanda johnson

customer_reviews.title: Look amazing and bright, but the leds do not last very long
customer_reviews.text: These are very affordable and work great, the problem is that the batteries die in probably 4-5 hours. Enough for a party, but nothing longer. By the time you blow them all up the first ones will probably be dimming. Great idea, but these need just a little more juice before these are a perfect party addition.
customer_reviews.author: Brit Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful balloon.
customer_reviews.text: I am a return customer for the same product. We use it for our volunteer work & kids love it so much.
customer_reviews.author: Villa

customer_reviews.title: Quite impressed
customer_reviews.text: How do they put an LED light into a balloon, with three batteries, with a chip to make it flash, and ship it to the United States for this price. I was impressed by the function. Created a wonderful ambiance at a party.
customer_reviews.author: TechDr

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: You can barely see the light through the balloon. In some you couldn’t see it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Camaro

customer_reviews.title: Great Balloons
customer_reviews.text: Balloons arrived on time, they not only glow but they flashed. They also were still glowing and flashing after 24 hours. Very fun for a birthday or a party.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great all in one light & balloon.
customer_reviews.text: I was really pleased with these. Every one of them worked when we pulled the tabs & they were great for our disco/glow party. A couple of the light units did come loose & then stopped lighting after some heavy knocks, but I was so happy with these.
customer_reviews.author: Eryn

customer_reviews.title: Nice LED glow balloons
customer_reviews.text: I bought these balloons to decorate for my 40th birthday. There were no problems filling them with helium, either. They were pretty and lasted a long time. They are very durable and vibrant colors. Excellent price for what you receive.
customer_reviews.author: Rita

customer_reviews.title: My 3 yr old LOVES these
customer_reviews.text: These are nice quality LED balloons. My 3 year old LOVES to play inside and outside with these. It takes a lot for them to pop outside, which is nice because they last longer!
customer_reviews.author: MaroftheMoon

customer_reviews.title: Bright, sturdy and fun.
customer_reviews.text: These are always a hit with the kids. Didn't have any duds.
customer_reviews.author: L. Ruberto

customer_reviews.title: Best balloons ever.
customer_reviews.text: All of my kids love these durable, colorful and fun, light up balloons. Bedtime story time has become a fun routine with the balloons serving as a night light.
customer_reviews.author: kirkome j netane

customer_reviews.title: These balloons stay lighted for at least 10 days!
customer_reviews.text: I just ordered these balloons again. We used them for birthdays, Bible school, family dance night, and New Year's Eve. We blow them up with air and tie them with ribbon, hang them around the room, or have them dancing all around the floor with us. Tie them loosely so you can untie them. You can then keep blowing them up anew every day. My grandkids were thrilled to see them still lit 10 days later.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVED!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! I used them for a glow in the dark dance party for kids! Ages ranged from 1-13 for the kids and they all loved them! They were still glowing till the next day! Will definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: koliver

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy if needing to rely on these working correctly
customer_reviews.text: I bought these knowing I could be making a mistake and it turned out I was sadly correct. My daughter had an evening 18th birthday party. We blew these up just as dark came. They didn't last even an hour and were very very dim. Shipping was quick enough but that is the only thing good about this order.
customer_reviews.author: chuck gandy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome balloons!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved this! These balloons were perfect for our glowstick party! They were easy to use. They are pretty, fun, and will be the hit of any party! They lasted the entire 4 hours and were still going! Will definitely buy for the next party!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: worked awesome
customer_reviews.text: loved these at our glow party for school. The only problem we had was when kids popped them sometimes the batteries went flying. Was great when used with supervision.
customer_reviews.author: iowadiva

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite purchases
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item to use at a fundraiser event. Worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: ivelisse severance

customer_reviews.title: So Fun with Long Lasting Light!
customer_reviews.text: We started the LED balloons to blink at 20pm and they were still blinking until the next morning. The color of these flashing balloons are amazing! Love it very much! I will definitely be ordering these again for our next party.
customer_reviews.author: Ruby

customer_reviews.title: Buy them now!
customer_reviews.text: They are so pretty omg made my baby party a blast just look at the photos and videos they speak for themselves
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Price

customer_reviews.title: Glad we bought them
customer_reviews.text: The balloons were a hit for our kids birthday party. The adults loved them too.
customer_reviews.author: ZLo1

customer_reviews.title: Pops easily
customer_reviews.text: They pop very easily and unusually loud when they do. They are very cool and pretty though. Easy to inflate
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buy
customer_reviews.text: These balloons were everything at my daughter’s glow party!! I would definitely buy these again
customer_reviews.author: Iesha

customer_reviews.title: They don’t last as long as claimed.
customer_reviews.text: They were adorable for a couple hours but they do not last. They say 12-24 hours. They stop changing colors after 4-6 hrs and just blink faintly.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Pirak

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: They last a long time, and we can many compliments!
customer_reviews.author: Josh and Heather Folsom

customer_reviews.title: Super Cool
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and her friends LOVE them! Easy to blow up and use. I have some to my son's daycare lady and the little ones had a blast too!
customer_reviews.author: Travis Gudmunsen

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: It added the finishing touch to my sons party! My little nephews and nieces got a kick out of all the lit balloons. Those balloons kept them busy for hours!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Baganha

customer_reviews.title: fun
customer_reviews.text: blow up many and turn the lights out. grand kids have so much fun with these. also play games with them. kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: Marta Eckley

customer_reviews.title: Not Very Bright
customer_reviews.text: Besides these balloons, the only other balloons I bought that I could compare are the ones at Party City, which were more expensive but much brighter. These were dim to the point that I would not buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: barb s.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Once they pop, be very careful. The lights have 4 tiny batteries that could be a choking hazard. They are amazingly fun though!!
customer_reviews.author: FlyingMom

customer_reviews.title: Adds ambience to DJ parties.
customer_reviews.text: Great party decorations. I used them to throw at the crowd during DJ parties
customer_reviews.author: DJ Transaction

customer_reviews.title: Flashing/blinking light is annoying
customer_reviews.text: The balloons are fine, but I didn’t know that the light inside blinks and flashes different colors. It gets pretty annoying, I wish they would just stay lit.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: These really made the party. I am so glad I bought these!
customer_reviews.author: Desiree London

customer_reviews.title: Lasted long enough for a party
customer_reviews.text: Led lasted long enough for a party most of the balloons stayed inflated for a few days
customer_reviews.author: J. Swanson

customer_reviews.title: Did not last long
customer_reviews.text: Led in the balloons only last an hour during set up, And didn’t glow through out the party
customer_reviews.author: Skiniminie

customer_reviews.title: Fun!!
customer_reviews.text: These were so much fun! I bought them for a birthday dance party - we used these and a strobe light and it was perfect. The flashing light was really bright for about 4 hours then started dimming but the balloons stayed inflated for days
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Great for the kids!
customer_reviews.text: My son has been asking for these for a long time and I finally got them for him. He was so happy with them! I am going to buy more of these for his birthday and hand them out as birthday party favors!
customer_reviews.author: J & T

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Lasted through the night, they were a hit at my niece’s birthday party
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: These things are really cool but you need darkness to really see them.
customer_reviews.author: Abianna

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting
customer_reviews.text: Was impressed and the lights lasted well into the next morning. They made for a great sleepover party. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: These actually work longer than expected. I get tired of them sometimes and put them out. But my little one enjoys playing with these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Festive
customer_reviews.text: We got these balloons for the holiday decorations and they were a big hit for thanksgiving! These balloons definitely made the party lot more festive, has no idea they have LED balloons, love them
customer_reviews.author: meimei

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: Love these! They made the party, everyone was so impressed. They lasted about 5 hours or so. Well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria M.

customer_reviews.title: Party balloons!
customer_reviews.text: They were easy to inflate, lasted all night and set the mood! Our teenage boy and his friends LOVED them!
customer_reviews.author: Krystal Przybylo

customer_reviews.title: Balloons were a great buy! Each one lit up and worked great
customer_reviews.text: Balloons were a great buy! Each one lit up and worked great! Excellent for a party and glowed bright for quite a while! Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Ballons
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product we did a night time balloon release for our family and friends that we’ve lost over the years.
customer_reviews.author: Melody Palmer-LiPuma

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Pretty great! It was a nice touch to the party. My friends loved them. They lasted the entire night for me. Only thing I disliked was the quick flashing transitions. Wish there was an option to change that. Other than that, 10/10.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Fun times
customer_reviews.text: This was a hit a my block party. All the kids and adults had fun with them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too heavy to rise
customer_reviews.text: The balloons don’t rise since the light is too heavy and if you blow them up too much, you can’t tie them anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Love thsm
customer_reviews.text: Colors are awesome. LEDs change all sorts of colors..awesome for bday party.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: These were very cool!
customer_reviews.text: The only downside to these are that the batteries were everywhere after the balloons deflated/popped. Some got in the pool and left rust stains in several spots.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Balloons
customer_reviews.text: These balloons were amazing. I recommend them and I would hand them from the ceiling to get the most of these balloons.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Esquivel

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money they pop right away
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to receive these balloons but unfortunately they where not as I expected the balloons where not even up for one hour when they started popping By the end of the party there was only like 5 balloons left out of 50 ridiculous very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I used this for my party a few days ago to throw for my husband and everyone loved it and thought it was creative especially my husband. When he came home he was absolutely shocked with how rave like and dope these were
customer_reviews.author: Nate96

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't float long
customer_reviews.text: You have to put a LOT of helium in these balloons to get them to float. Even then they don't float for very long. I filled them up 1 hr before the party and they were on the ground within a hour after the party started. Luckily it was a kids party so they had fun kicking them around.
customer_reviews.author: Kacie Quinn

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY
customer_reviews.text: Half the lights didn't even work & what did work was very faint. Never buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Bailey Kingery

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money. Lit up really well. Did pop fairly easily, and they weren't overinflated. Kids still loved them!!
customer_reviews.author: Christina H.

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and beautiful light color change patterns. Will definitely consider buying again next year.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: As advertised!
customer_reviews.text: Only had a couple of duds that didn’t lit up well. They have held a good bit of air even a couple of days later. And quite a few are still blinking!
customer_reviews.author: girlsmomma

customer_reviews.title: Not safe for small children
customer_reviews.text: These were a great value and sub, BUT! When they pop (and they did fairly easily), the LED falls to the ground and the button battery popped out. We had an event with children, and all those little batteries on the ground were very worrisome.
customer_reviews.author: Tracie Palm

customer_reviews.title: INJURIES
customer_reviews.text: This product was very unsafe for us. Caused a person to have a seizure. This person has never had a seizure in hia life. After the seizure accrued. We dedcied to pop all the ballons the led flew out of the ballons and hit a person in the face and stomach causing minor injurys. I would like to have my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Troudt

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: These balloons were the highlight of our glow in the dark pep rally. They are not cheap looking and held up well.
customer_reviews.author: ktamac

customer_reviews.title: Only worked for 2 hours!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these balloons for our sons 8th birthday party which was outside in the evening. Blew them up strung them up outside and they only worked for 2 hours :(. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Morhous

customer_reviews.title: didn't last very long
customer_reviews.text: did not last for length of party. Would not buy
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed, save your money
customer_reviews.text: I thought these were so cool & perfect decor for evening party! Unfortunately, filling them with air did not work even though it’s described. The balloon didn’t float in air, instead drooped to floor when blown up. Also bag didn’t contain 50 balloons.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: kids love these
customer_reviews.text: You can be the hit of a party with these balloons ... they love them.
customer_reviews.author: William D.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality balloons
customer_reviews.text: These are great balloons and last for days! The flickering lights are fun!
customer_reviews.author: Someone

product_meta.title: Party LED Balloons Lights 50 Pieces Balloons LED Assorted Colors Luminous Balloons Flashing Light ( Pack of 50 )
product_meta.description:
Product Features:

*Excellent Party Decor Idea.

*Lasts 12-24 Hours(Maxminum brightness in the 6 hours).

*50 Pack of Multicolors. Balloon pack comes in a variety of colors: Red, Blue, Pink, Green, Yellow, Purple and Orange. Amaze your guests and bring light and color to any special event.

*Ideal for Indoor & Outdoor Use.

*Made of High-Quality Latex Material.

*Fillable with Helium, Air, or Water.

*Inflates up to 12 inch.

*Inside each balloon is a single LED light. 

*LED Light Up Balloons can be filled with air or helium for unlimited decorative possibilities.

*The balloons are made with premium materials to ensure that they can be inflated easily and resist breaking.

*LED lights are attached to the top of the balloon from the inside; so the LED lights do not move around in the balloon.






Please Note:(Very important！)

Low temperature (lower than 50°F) will deduce the life of the batteries(Only flash 2-4 hours).So please do not take it as decoration at outside when cold.






BESTTY WARRANTY:

100%Money back if any problem with the balloons. In terms of any problem of the balloons, you can contact our customer-service staff at any time. We will give you a best solution.
feature_bullets: 50 Pack LED glowing balloons come in multicolor. Batteries included.
Flashing LED light in each balloon. Simple to use. Suitable for helium or air filling, inflate like a normal balloon. You can inflate the balloons to 12 inches (Maximum).
Each balloon (blinking) can flash up about 12-24 hours (Bright mode in the first 6 hours). LED feature works best in dim/dark environments, you can dim your lights for its best performance.
Vivid and stunning enough to match your occasion regardless of your House Party, Birthday, Anniversary, Dance Club, or any other event.
Please Note(Important):Low temperature (lower than 50°F) will deduce the life of the batteries (Only flash 2-4 hours). So please do not take it as decoration outside when cold.
